price: 52. Nee, ieder van hen wenst dat hij pagina’s gegeven zal hebben, uitgespreid.
arabic: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفٗا مُّنَشَّرَةٗ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: bal yurīdu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yu'tā ṣuḥufan munasharatan
